about_the_game:
Landfall is an exhilarating cooperative survival extraction game set in a vibrant low-poly world, where every decision counts and every moment is a test of your skills. Immerse yourself in a gameplay experience designed to be accessible to players of all skill levels.

Dive into Dynamic Maps: Your mission is clear—survive, loot, and escape from perilous foes in diverse environments. Engage in thrilling encounters with soldiers and zombies, each presenting unique challenges.



Experience Fluid Parkour Gameplay! Leap, vault, and scale obstacles with ease in Landfall. Master the art of parkour to traverse the landscape dynamically, turning every environment into your playground.

Intuitive Gameplay: With full controller support and adjustable difficulty levels for every map, Landfall caters to everyone, from beginners to seasoned players.

Key Features:

  • Full Controller Support: Experience seamless gameplay with complete controller compatibility.

  • Multiple Difficulty Levels: Tailor your experience to suit your skill level, ensuring fun for all players.

  • Variety of Enemies: Face off against soldiers and zombies, each bringing distinct challenges to your survival quest.

  • Extraction System: Loot essential items and plan your escape carefully to ensure safety before time runs out.

  • Revive or Retreat: If you fall in battle, try to reclaim your lost gear or choose to extract safely at the factory.

  • Moderately Sized Maps: Explore dynamic environments filled with engaging PvE quests and random loot, keeping the experience fresh.

  • Vibrant Low-Poly World: Enjoy the unique visual appeal of a stylized low-poly landscape that enhances your adventure.

Get ready to conquer, survive, and extract in Landfall! Join your friends in this action-packed journey and see if you have what it takes to thrive in a world where danger lurks around every corner!

content_descriptors.notes: Really small violence, no drug, a little alcool, no smoking.

name: LandFall Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 4200U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7 6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Landfall is a thrilling low-poly co-op dungeon crawler and extraction game. Build and upgrade your base, trade with vendors, and team up to explore diverse maps, complete quests, gather loot, and defeat bosses. Gear up, survive, and thrive together in this unique low-poly PvE adventure.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
